hymn.title: What Kind of a Sharer?
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—General

layout.singingstanza: What kind of a shar -- er does ev -- ery -- bod -- y love? What kind of a shar -- er does ev -- ery -- bod -- y love? While play -- ing with my broth -- ers and my sis -- ters and my friends, Ev -- ery -- one loves a gen -- 'rous, will -- ing shar -- er with a grin.
layout.sheetcopyright: www.hymnal.net; © 2014 Bible StorySongs, Inc. Used by permission.

lyrics.stanza: What kind of a sharer does everybody love? What kind of a sharer does everybody love? While playing with my brothers and my sisters and my friends, Everyone loves a generous, willing sharer with a grin.

My snacks and my muffins, my favorite truck or hat; My colors, my markers; I'm sharing this and that. It's not because I have to, and it's not with a pity-pout! When we share with everyone we're happy — there's no doubt.
